overview:
Passionate about messaging, digital, traditional and social media to forge connections, she has pitching reporters, bloggers and Twitter users for clients in the financial services, health care, and management consulting sectors. She is always eager to continue helping organizations add value through communication strategies.

In addition to the traditional crafting press pitches, releases and pitching reporters by phone, she has done a great deal of writing and editing. As well as drafted case studies, whitepapers, creative writing pieces, and speaking opportunity pitches.

DeAnna is skilled in research and content strategies, optimizing and managing social media platforms such as Twitter and Facebook for B2B and B2C clients, and building/maintaining Web sites with WordPress.

Her expertise is marketing, social media, and writing. she has assisted with strategy and executive of national consumer, social media, and financial sector marketing/PR initiatives.

Previous to her agency experience, she was an assistant property manager at two residential real-estate companies in Metro-Boston and Denver, CO.

Specialties Social Media, Marketing, PR, writing, editing, personable personality, outgoing, confident, intelligent, positive, resourceful. Proficient both Windows XP and Mac OS operating systems. Proficient in Adobe CS, Microsoft Office, Outlook, Wordpress, Yardi, CisionPoint media database and possess the ability to learn new software quickly.
